Let me know if that is possible.

Subject: RE: Netwrix Support Ticket #426409 - - Content Aware Policies Print sensitive data Policy [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0I0w6W:ref ]
Please find below the answers to the questions raised:

1. We would recommend upgrading the EPP server to the latest version 5941 and also using the most recent EPP client:  https://download.endpointprotector.com/custom_agent/Epp16122024/EppClient_v6.2.4.0041.zip
Note: Please create a Snapshot of the EPP server from the VM/AWS/Azure/GCP platform on which it is hosted, if it is hosted on your end.

2. Please test with the above mentioned client: 6.2.4.0041 as it is the most recent build. Please only use it for testing on a few test computers and do not mass deploy it. The 6.2.3.1 is a GA release client, improvements to the EPP clients are made almost daily by our devs so using the most recent test build may resolve the issue.
3. Please use the EPP client provided by my colleague Eduard for testing and let us know the outcome, after your colleagues managed to run their tests with it.

4. Our engineers and devs make new client builds almost daily with improvements and fixes. They usually test with the GA client(the one present on the EPP server) and also with the most recent test build. New functionalities or bug fixes are implemented in the new test builds and they will all be included in the next GA release client version.
Please let me know if there is any other information that we can provide.
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
Subject: RE: Netwrix Support Ticket #426409 - - Content Aware Policies Print sensitive data Policy [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0I0w6W:ref ]

In my current client version ( 6.2.2.2005 ) I am not able to generate the CAN SSN file print job triggered at EPP console ( see the attached file ) .   I also tried to upload the same file at DLPtest.com and did not get any alert on EPP console .

1 ) Today when I open the EPP server , I am seeing this server upgrade message ( see the 1st  picture below )   So my question is , do I need to update the server  ,   before I re attempt  to perform same testing on CAN SSN  ( print or upload test ) .

2)   When we go to “System configuration > Client Software “  I see the client version 6.2.3.1 , So my question is , do I need to update the client to 6.2.3.1  ,   before I re attempt  to perform same testing on CAN SSN  ( print or upload test ) .

3)  Edward sent us new build test client 3 days back and wanted to upgrade to only few users , We are still waiting from our  EUC team to install this new test version of client to our  machines and than after we can try to perform the same CAN SSN  ( print or upload test )  and see  if   the test is passing or failing
4)    Which client version of EPP   your Engineering Team using  and passing the test on your side ?
NOTE :  Please reply to all to this email , so that my team is aware of the situation , kindly please , do not reply on the ticket other wise my teams will not get any response .
